## Data

-   All data in this tool is available under the Open Government Licence - British Columbia (OGL-BC): <https://www2.gov.bc.ca/gov/content/data/policy-standards/data-policies/open-data/open-government-licence-bc>

-   Metadata and related resources for the Biogeoclimatic Projections can be found on the BC Data Catalogue
